
```{r, include=FALSE}
library(gior)
library(dplyr)
```

## gior

An R [htmlwidget](https://www.htmlwidgets.org/) for [gio.js](http://giojs.org/).

> A Declarative 3D Globe Data Visualization Library built with Three.js

## Installation

You can install `gior` with `devtools`

```r
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/gior")
```

or `remotes`

```r
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/gior")
```

## Example

Example of `gior` and two of its proxies.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
data("country_data")

country_data %>%
  gior() %>%
  g_data(from, to, value)
```

## Notes

`gior` supports continents:

- Oceania
- North America
- South America
- Europe
- Asia
- Africa
